title: 9 Ways to Have a Frugal Pioneer Christmas like Laura Ingalls
description: Learn how the pioneers celebrated Christmas and how to use the same tips to transform your Christmas into something special and memorable without spending money.
content:encoded: Learn how the pioneers celebrated Christmas and how to use the same tips to transform your Christmas into something special and memorable without spending money.
itunes:subtitle: Tips for an old-fashioned Christmas
author: melissa@melissaknorris.com (Melissa K. Norris 5th Generation Homesteader)
